Instruction: 'Cook the spaghetti noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.'
In a small bowl, whisk together creamy peanut butter, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, minced garlic, grated ginger
'Toss the cooked noodles with the peanut sauce until well coated.'
'Garnish the peanut noodles with chopped green onions and peanuts before serving.'
